laboratory_examinations.findings: Liver parenchyma demonstrates normal echogenicity. Mild intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Common bile duct measures about 7 mm. Gallbladder is distended and contains gallstones. No gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid. Portal vein is patent.
9.3 mg/dL (normal range 8.4 - 10.3 mg/dL), within normal range.
